title: Haru: King of the Forest
description: This anime classic follows the forest adventures of Haru and his magical friends.
quote: Only those with a strong heart like yours can break this curse.
altHero: Haru, a Japanese boy wearing a flower headband, salutes from a large tree branch
alt1: Haru cries as a small hand holds a glowing flower
alt2: a small flower creature holds the glowinf flower
alt3: a group of fantasy woodland characters cheer
